Sentences: Ai gwen go town tumoroa.
Dem hoel bin buil’ big-wan las’ year.
Ef yu had come early, wi wud had tea tugeda.

Ai haeb meeting wit dem from council dis arvo.

Sentences: Yu contribution is greatly appreciated by da organization.
Wha’ gwen, no can stop, eh!
Yu no ken put pig in a dress an’ call um lady.
Dem say, 'Wan han’ can’t clap by itself.'
Ef yu plant taro, yu can’t expect banana.
‘Slowly slowly catchee monkey,’ dat true!
No evri shiny ting es gold.

Q: Watawieh? A: Ai gud, yu?
Q: Wea yu gwen? A: Ai gwen down town.
Q: Yu si dem ship? A: Ya, ai si um jus’ now.
Q: Wha yu doin’? A: Ai cookin’ fish f’ tea.
Q: Dem kids finish school yet? A: Not yet, nex’ week.
Q: Yu no tink dat too late? A: Maybe, but betta late den neva.
Q: Yu haeb time t’ help mi? A: Ya, short while.
Q: Wea yu bin all dis time? A: Ai bin long home cleanin’.
Q: Yu laek come movie wit mi? A: Ya sure!
Q: Dem shop still open? A: Nah, close early today.

Make sure dem window lock up good.
